name: CQ.Ext.CompositeElement
doc:
This class encapsulates a collection of DOM elements, providing methods to filter
members, or to ...

props.name: elements
props.doc:
The Array of DOM elements which this CompositeElement encapsulates. Read-only.
This will not usua...

methods.name: add
methods.doc: Adds elements to this Composite object.

methods.name: each
methods.doc: Calls the passed function for each element in this composite.

methods.name: fill
methods.doc: Clears this Composite and adds the elements passed.

methods.name: filter
methods.doc: Filters this composite to only elements that match the passed selector.

methods.name: getCount
methods.doc: Returns the number of elements in this Composite.

methods.name: indexOf
methods.doc: Find the index of the passed element within the composite collection.

methods.name: item
methods.doc: Returns a flyweight Element of the dom element object at the specified index

methods.name: replaceElement
methods.doc: Replaces the specified element with the passed element.
